title: Ugly Brown Screen Freezing then Bugsplat
body:
League has been nothing but trouble for me since the new client. 
I think at least every 2-3 games I play on league, whether its Rift, ARAM, or rotating game mode, sometime during the game my screen will turn a completely ugly sort of brown and bronze colour, the game freezes from anywhere to 5-10 seconds and then crashes with a bugsplat. While this is happening I can still hear people on discord and they can still hear me. It's hard to play with horrible interruptions like this. 

Specs: 4670k/GTX980/16GB DDR3/120GB SSD/1TB HDD/ 144hz Monitor. 

Graphics driver updates do nothing to help.
League is the only game that crashes for me (Except PUBG but that's understandable). 

I'd love some help to be able to finish this issue. I tried pinpointing it to a program such at Plays.tv so I uninstalled but the crashes still occur. I do not use Xbox DVR or record with shadowplay.
